answers.answer: I really don't know. I think it would be fine, but you would need to ask your doctor.

Yeah you need to talk to your doctor, he is the only one who can say for sure. But here is an interesting article about diabetes and ED http://www.edguider.com/levitra/can_levitra_help_diabetes_or_prostate_cancer.html

question: I’m a 48 years old male and I have diabetes and I’m taking insulin for this. My question is can I use lavitra? I found some information about it at http://www.levitrabliss.com/diabetes_and_levitra.html  , I want to know more before I would go for it .
title: Diabetes and levitra
